pull.title: doc: update links in ci.yml
pull.body: Updated three outdated GitHub links to avoid redirects.

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ðŸ‘Ž to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
I'm interpreting the lint failure to be related to Cirrus CI itself.

I can reproduce the redirects in ece55afa1da973687877b23bc43d9ed354ede3bf. Can you rename the commit to something like `doc: update links in ci.yml`? (as @fanquake did for the PR title)

The CI failure went away.
